page.title: 05THE BRAES HALL
page.content: The hall is run by a committee made up of all interested people in the district. In the last few years the committee has run a barbecue and dance in the summer both to entertain and to raise funds for the upkeep of the hall. It also organises a bonfire and fireworks display around 5th November and at Christmas there is a party and social. During the winter evenings the hall is used by the local youth club and by the badminton club. The youth club is open to all children between 8 and 15 with archery, uni-hockey, darts and snooker a few of the recreations on offer. The badminton club has a junior section for the under 11's, as well as a section for the older child and another for adults.
